get.description: Lists the operations available from this provider.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: A skip token is used to continue retrieving items after an operation returns a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skipToken parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

post.description: Checks whether the configuration store name is available for use.

requestBody.description: The object containing information for the availability request.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

connectionString.description: A connection string that can be used by supporting clients for authentication.

lastModified.description: The last time any of the key's properties were modified.

name.description: A name for the key describing its usage.

readOnly.description: Whether this key can only be used for read operations.

value.description: The value of the key that is used for authentication purposes.

ApiKey.description: An API key used for authenticating with a configuration store endpoint.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next set of paged results.

ApiKeyListResult.description: The result of a request to list API keys.

name.description: The name to check for availability.

type.description: The resource type to check for name availability.

CheckNameAvailabilityParameters.description: Parameters used for checking whether a resource name is available.

ConfigurationStore.description: The configuration store along with all resource properties. The Configuration Store will have all information to begin utilizing it.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next set of paged results.

ConfigurationStoreListResult.description: The result of a request to list configuration stores.

creationDate.description: The creation date of configuration store.

endpoint.description: The DNS endpoint where the configuration store API will be available.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the configuration store.

ConfigurationStoreProperties.description: The properties of a configuration store.

ConfigurationStorePropertiesUpdateParame.description: The properties for updating a configuration store.

ConfigurationStoreUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating a configuration store.

EncryptionProperties.description: The encryption settings for a configuration store.

contentType.description:
The content type of the key-value's value.
Providing a proper content-type can enable transformations of values when they are retrieved by applications.

eTag.description: An ETag indicating the state of a key-value within a configuration store.

key.description:
The primary identifier of a key-value.
The key is used in unison with the label to uniquely identify a key-value.

label.description:
A value used to group key-values.
The label is used in unison with the key to uniquely identify a key-value.

lastModified.description: The last time a modifying operation was performed on the given key-value.

locked.description:
A value indicating whether the key-value is locked.
A locked key-value may not be modified until it is unlocked.

tags.description: A dictionary of tags that can help identify what a key-value may be applicable for.

KeyValue.description: The result of a request to retrieve a key-value from the specified configuration store.

identityClientId.description: The client id of the identity which will be used to access key vault.

keyIdentifier.description: The URI of the key vault key used to encrypt data.

KeyVaultProperties.description: Settings concerning key vault encryption for a configuration store.

ListKeyValueParameters.description: The parameters used to list a configuration store key-value

message.description: If any, the error message that provides more detail for the reason that the name is not available.

nameAvailable.description: The value indicating whether the resource name is available.

reason.description: If any, the reason that the name is not available.

NameAvailabilityStatus.description: The result of a request to check the availability of a resource name.

OperationDefinition.description: The definition of a configuration store operation.

operation.description: The operation that users can perform.

provider.description: The resource provider name: Microsoft App Configuration."

resource.description: The resource on which the operation is performed.

OperationDefinitionDisplay.description: The display information for a configuration store operation.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next set of paged results.

OperationDefinitionListResult.description: The result of a request to list configuration store operations.

id.description: The resource Id for private endpoint

PrivateEndpoint.description: Private endpoint which a connection belongs to.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next set of paged results.

PrivateEndpointConnectionListResult.description: A list of private endpoint connections

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the private endpoint connection.

PrivateEndpointConnectionProperties.description: Properties of a private endpoint connection.

PrivateLinkResource.description: A resource that supports private link capabilities.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next set of paged results.

PrivateLinkResourceListResult.description: A list of private link resources.

groupId.description: The private link resource group id.

requiredMembers.description: The private link resource required member names.

PrivateLinkResourceProperties.description: Properties of a private link resource.

actionsRequired.description: Any action that is required beyond basic workflow (approve/ reject/ disconnect)

description.description: The private link service connection description.

status.description: The private link service connection status.

PrivateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: The state of a private link service connection.

id.description: The id of the key to regenerate.

RegenerateKeyParameters.description: The parameters used to regenerate an API key.

location.description: The location of the resource. This cannot be changed after the resource is created.

principalId.description: The principal id of the identity. This property will only be provided for a system-assigned identity.

tenantId.description: The tenant id associated with the resource's identity. This property will only be provided for a system-assigned identity.

type.description: The type of managed identity used. The type 'SystemAssigned, UserAssigned' includes both an implicitly created identity and a set of user-assigned identities. The type 'None' will remove any identities.

userAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user-assigned identities associated with the resource. The user-assigned identity dictionary keys will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

ResourceIdentity.description: An identity that can be associated with a resource.

name.description: The SKU name of the configuration store.

clientId.description: The client ID of the user-assigned identity.

principalId.description: The principal ID of the user-assigned identity.

UserIdentity.description: A resource identity that is managed by the user of the service.

ConfigStoreNameParameter.name: configStoreName
ConfigStoreNameParameter.description: The name of the configuration store.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group to which the container registry belongs.
